name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Calliope Mori's First 3D Birthday Concert! #calli3DBD [hrcZEjdrkRg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope and Hoshimachi Suisei perform 'CapSule' on stage.
Major Debut announcement video sequence with various visual teasers.
Mori Calliope delivers an emotional MC speech regarding her major debut and upcoming projects.

subtitles.original: どこへ行っても
subtitles.english: No matter where I go

subtitles.original: 狙い定める
subtitles.english: I'll set my aim

subtitles.original: もう居ないや
subtitles.english: There's no one left

subtitles.original: As we wanted
subtitles.english: As we wanted

subtitles.original: 弾む声
subtitles.english: Our bouncing voices

subtitles.original: Up faster and faster leader we can't be faster enough
subtitles.english: Up faster and faster leader we can't be faster enough

subtitles.original: We want it all, and when it falls
subtitles.english: We want it all, and when it falls

subtitles.original: Stay proud without any storm and you can't get louder
subtitles.english: Stay proud without any storm and you can't get louder

subtitles.original: We want it all, and when it falls
subtitles.english: We want it all, and when it falls

subtitles.original: I'm gone by your side, I won't be your salt
subtitles.english: I'm gone by your side, I won't be your salt

subtitles.original: Still I'm mourning those eyes
subtitles.english: Still I'm mourning those eyes

subtitles.original: Those eyes...
subtitles.english: Those eyes...

subtitles.original: Mori Calliope x 星街すいせい 「CapSule」 streaming now!
subtitles.english: Mori Calliope x Hoshimachi Suisei "CapSule" streaming now!

subtitles.original: UNIVERSAL MUSIC GROUP
subtitles.english: UNIVERSAL MUSIC GROUP

subtitles.original: Major Debut
subtitles.english: Major Debut

subtitles.original: 07.21.2022 at Toyosu PIT Solo concert Coming soon...
subtitles.english: 07.21.2022 at Toyosu PIT Solo concert Coming soon...

subtitles.original: (Laughing) Oh my gosh...
subtitles.english: (Laughing) Oh my gosh...

subtitles.original: You guys are so... You guys are such a surprise...
subtitles.english: You guys are so... You guys are such a surprise...

subtitles.original: ...and excited. Thank you. Thank you so much everyone.
subtitles.english: ...and excited. Thank you. Thank you so much everyone.

subtitles.original: Yes, uh, the truth is, um, I am now signed to Universal Music.
subtitles.english: Yes, uh, the truth is, um, I am now signed to Universal Music.

subtitles.original: Um, and I am doing... it's my major debut...
subtitles.english: Um, and I am doing... it's my major debut...

subtitles.original: I'm lost for words, I like don't know what to say.
subtitles.english: I'm lost for words, I like don't know what to say.

subtitles.original: Um, this is like something I dreamed for for such a long time.
subtitles.english: Um, this is like something I dreamed for for such a long time.

subtitles.original: Um, honestly, I... I dreamed of doing something like this.
subtitles.english: Um, honestly, I... I dreamed of doing something like this.

subtitles.original: And um... Yeah, I'm not gonna... I won't get emotional right now.
subtitles.english: And um... Yeah, I'm not gonna... I won't get emotional right now.

subtitles.original: Um, we got a couple things to talk about, so...
subtitles.english: Um, we got a couple things to talk about, so...

subtitles.original: But yes, I am debuting from Universal Music.
subtitles.english: But yes, I am debuting from Universal Music.

subtitles.original: And I will also be doing, um, a solo live show in July.
subtitles.english: And I will also be doing, um, a solo live show in July.

subtitles.original: My first solo on a real stage in front of a crowd.
subtitles.english: My first solo on a real stage in front of a crowd.

subtitles.original: In front of all of you guys. So let the Dead Beat Empire continue onward.
subtitles.english: In front of all of you guys. So let the Dead Beat Empire continue onward.

subtitles.original: And um... and there's a new EP.
subtitles.english: And um... and there's a new EP.

subtitles.original: Major debut new EP called "SHINGAMI NOTE".
subtitles.english: Major debut new EP called "SHINGAMI NOTE".

subtitles.original: "SHINGAMI NOTE", 死神の音...
subtitles.english: "SHINGAMI NOTE", Shinigami no Oto...

subtitles.original: ...which is kind of a popular... it's like a play on words.
subtitles.english: ...which is kind of a popular... it's like a play on words.

subtitles.original: Um, you'll see later when you read the kanji, but, uh...
subtitles.english: Um, you'll see later when you read the kanji, but, uh...

subtitles.original: Thank you everyone, um, who's been supporting me.
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone, um, who's been supporting me.

subtitles.original: And... and yeah, I'm really excited to see where this journey takes us.
subtitles.english: And... and yeah, I'm really excited to see where this journey takes us.

subtitles.original: But I promise you guys I'll still be me.
subtitles.english: But I promise you guys I'll still be me.

subtitles.original: I'll still be making the music I want to make.
subtitles.english: I'll still be making the music I want to make.

subtitles.original: It's just it's going to be on a larger scale. I'm like shaking right now.
subtitles.english: It's just it's going to be on a larger scale. I'm like shaking right now.

subtitles.original: Um, I'm still going to make the music that I want to make and for the world that I want to see.
subtitles.english: Um, I'm still going to make the music that I want to make and for the world that I want to see.

subtitles.original: This is a little corny, but... anyway...
subtitles.english: This is a little corny, but... anyway...

subtitles.original: This is like the biggest thing that's ever happened to me in my life.
subtitles.english: This is like the biggest thing that's ever happened to me in my life.

subtitles.original: So and I wouldn't be here if... if you guys didn't love what I do so much and support me...
subtitles.english: So and I wouldn't be here if... if you guys didn't love what I do so much and support me...

subtitles.original: ...and cheer for me and listen to my music and thank you so much.
subtitles.english: ...and cheer for me and listen to my music and thank you so much.

subtitles.original: Yeah. So I want to explain some things.
subtitles.english: Yeah. So I want to explain some things.

subtitles.original: I want to explain a little bit about the EP and whatnot.
subtitles.english: I want to explain a little bit about the EP and whatnot.

subtitles.original: 説明しますね。
subtitles.english: I'll explain it.

subtitles.original: So first, we have of course "CapSule", first major single...
subtitles.english: So first, we have of course "CapSule", first major single...

subtitles.original: And guess what, it's featuring my beloved singing senpai Hoshimachi Suisei...
subtitles.english: And guess what, it's featuring my beloved singing senpai Hoshimachi Suisei...

subtitles.original: ...who I respect and love so much. We love Suisei-senpai.
subtitles.english: ...who I respect and love so much. We love Suisei-senpai.

subtitles.original: And I could not have chosen a better partner to be involved in my first major single from Universal Music.
subtitles.english: And I could not have chosen a better partner to be involved in my first major single from Universal Music.

subtitles.original: Um, and yeah, it's actually premiering after this show.
subtitles.english: Um, and yeah, it's actually premiering after this show.

subtitles.original: The MV YouTube premier and digital release.
subtitles.english: The MV YouTube premier and digital release.

subtitles.original: It's going to be 30 minutes... not 30 minutes... um, more like...
subtitles.english: It's going to be 30 minutes... not 30 minutes... um, more like...

subtitles.original: ...more like 25 from now on my channel, so please check it out, "CapSule".
subtitles.english: ...more like 25 from now on my channel, so please check it out, "CapSule".

subtitles.original: Um, yeah, let's go to the next slide. 次に行きます。
subtitles.english: Um, yeah, let's go to the next slide. Moving to the next.

subtitles.original: Next we've got "SHINGAMI NOTE", 死神の音.
subtitles.english: Next we've got "SHINGAMI NOTE", Shinigami no Oto.

subtitles.original: If you check it out at the bottom, it's like, you know, SHINGAMI Music Note...
subtitles.english: If you check it out at the bottom, it's like, you know, SHINGAMI Music Note...

subtitles.original: ...get it? Right? 'Cause music.
subtitles.english: ...get it? Right? 'Cause music.

subtitles.original: But then also 死神の音, using the kanji for "sound"...
subtitles.english: But then also Shinigami no Oto, using the kanji for "sound"...

subtitles.original: ...which is kind of a popular play on words in Japan. So, um, yeah.
subtitles.english: ...which is kind of a popular play on words in Japan. So, um, yeah.

subtitles.original: My first major EP. And we have the art done by my fantastic Mama, Yukisame Mama.
subtitles.english: My first major EP. And we have the art done by my fantastic Mama, Yukisame Mama.
